column1: '''Ringbearer's Day 2005''' Celebrating 50 years of [[The Lord of the Rings]] is a special edition journal published by the [[North East Tolkien Society]]. The journal coincides with their [[Ringbearer's Day 2005]] convention.
* Letters from the Chairman & Co-chair of Heren Istarion: The New York Tolkien Society
* Middle-earth Minstrel Sing-Along of Glasshammer's "Old Troll" and "Dwarf & Orc"
